content.en: Algorithmic Wave Optimization: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can improve the efficiency and design of wave energy converters. They are investigating the use of various optimization algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and differential evolution algorithms, to optimize the performance and cost-effectiveness of different types of wave energy converters. Additionally, model predictive control algorithms are being studied to optimize the power set-point tracking and improve the electrical power performance of these converters.
content.da: Algoritmisk bølgeoptimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre effektiviteten og designet af bølgeenergikonvertere. De undersøger brugen af forskellige optimeringsalgoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer og differentialevolution algoritmer, for at optimere ydeevnen og omkostningseffektiviteten af forskellige typer bølgeenergikonvertere. Derudover studeres modelprædiktive kontrolalgoritmer for at optimere strøm set-point sporing og forbedre den elektriske ydeevne af disse konvertere.
